examples.description: See how to use API linting to enforce api consistency and require Zuplo features like policies.

examples.description: See how to create dynamic rate limits with the Rick & Morty API sample.

examples.description: Capture the full request and response to send to your log provider.

examples.description: Use custom data from OpenAPI documents in policies and handlers.

examples.description: Use a custom policy to rewrite the body of a Request

examples.title: Custom Base Path
examples.description: Use custom properties in OpenAPI documents to remove a base path and set the forwarding server.

examples.title: Mocking & Unit Test
examples.description: Create unit tests by mocking Zuplo objects.

examples.title: Schema Validation with File Refs
examples.description: Use the Request Validation policy with OpenAPI that references external files.

examples.title: A/B Testing
examples.description: Add A/B testing to your Zuplo project
